name: 0 - Intro
_source: speak;Young Emily; Sis, look, a boar!{w} You got your bow ready?
speak;Young Emma; I'm scared, Young Emily{tgm}...{w} The boar looks dangerous!{w} I got magic, so why can't I just set it on fire?
speak;Young Emily; Young Emma, your magic goes out of control when you get scared, remember?{w} So learning how to hunt without magic is the best thing for you.
speak;Young Emma; But that lady in our village was teaching me how to control it!{w} I think I can do it!
speak;Young Emily; You mean that lady that just took out the boar for us?
speak;Young Emily; Hmph. Looks like you got our boar for us!

speak;Selena; Oh, this is <bconvo>your</> boar, now, is it?{w}{c:expression;Selena;NoSmile} I'm sorry for stealing it from you, though.{w} Young Emma, how was my teaching?{w} Did you learn to control your magic better?
speak;Young Emma; I still want to learn as much from you as possible, Miss Selena!{w} When we get back, can you give me another lesson?
speak;Selena; Sure thing, kiddo!{w}{c:expression;Selena;NoSmile} Wait, I hear something{tgm}...
speak;Young Emily; Emma!!!{w} She's knocked out, Selena!
speak;Selena; Emily, take your sister back to the village! It's not safe here.
speak;Young Emily; Emma, don't you worry.{w} I'm here for you{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Lily will patch you up.
